meanings.sent1: The paperhanger carefully measured the wall before applying the wallpaper.
meanings.sent2: The paperhanger was hired to beautify the living room with a floral wallpaper.
meanings.sent3: The paperhanger joked that he could wallpaper his own house blindfolded.
meanings.sent4: The paperhanger's hands moved with precision, like a painter creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Watching the paperhanger at work was like witnessing an artist transform a blank canvas.

meanings.sent1: Our house looks amazing thanks to the skilled paperhanger we hired.
meanings.sent2: The paperhanger arrived with all the tools needed to complete the wallpaper installation.
meanings.sent3: The paperhanger's van was filled with rolls of colorful wallpaper, like a mobile art studio.
meanings.sent4: The paperhanger's expertise turned plain walls into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The paperhanger's precision was like that of a surgeon, ensuring every seam was flawless.

meanings.definition: Someone who decorates walls with paper.
meanings.sent1: The paperhanger transformed the dull room into a cozy space with his wallpaper designs.
meanings.sent2: We hired a talented paperhanger to add a touch of elegance to our home.
meanings.sent3: The paperhanger's creativity knew no bounds when it came to wall decorations.
meanings.sent4: The paperhanger's work was like a magic spell, turning ordinary walls into enchanting displays.
meanings.sent5: The paperhanger's skill in choosing the perfect wallpaper was unmatched, creating a stunning visual impact.
